restartDialog: You must restart your computer for the changes to take effect
pageTweaksSecurityDescription: Windows Defender, CPU mitigations, system safeguards
pageTweaksPerformanceDescription: Background apps, memory tuning, power settings, CPU optimizations
pageTweaksUpdatesDescription: Manage updates system for Windows and apps
homeDescription: A tool to personalize ReviOS to your needs
settingsUpdateButtonAvailablePrompt: Would you like to update Revision Tool to
settingsCTDescription: Switch between light and dark mode, or automatically change the theme with Windows
restartAppDialog: You must restart your app for the changes to take effect
settingsLanguageDescription: Languages are not guraranteed to be fully translated or correct
msstorePackagesPrompt: Would you like to install the following packages?
tweaksSecurityDefenderDescription: Windows Defender will protect your PC. This will have a performance impact due to constantly running in the background
securityDialog: Please disable every protection before completely disabling Windows Defender
tweaksSecurityHWMitigationDescription: Speculative execution vulnerability mitigations. Performance impact varies by CPU generation.
tweaksSecuritySMitigationDescription: Defensive patches for speculative execution vulnerabilities that can allow unauthorized access to system memory
tweaksSecurityDownfallMitigationDescript: Protection against vulnerabilities in certain Intel processors that could expose sensitive data. Disabling this protection while Hyper-V (Virtualization) is enabled is currently not supported.
tweaksSecuritySystemSafeguardsDescriptio: Account elevation prompts and system protection settings
tweaksSecurityUACDescription: Limits application to standard user privileges until an administrator authorizes an elevation
tweaksSecurityCertsDescription: Use it when having issues with certificates
tweaksSecurityCertsUpdateDialog: Updating of root certificates has finished. Try the software that you had issues with again, and if the issue persists, please contact our support.
tweaksPerformanceRdyBoostDescription: Required for memory optimizations, defrag/TRIM, and Superfetch features, but may cause latency issues in some scenarios. Superfetch always remains disabled for SSDs
tweaksPerformanceMemoryCompressionDescri: Save memory by compressing unused programs running in the background. Might have a small impact on CPU usage depending on hardware
tweaksPerformanceServiceGroupingDescript: Recommended is the default for ReviOS. Use Forced to significantly reduce memory usage; however, some features like Xbox may not work as expected.
tweaksPerformanceServiceGroupingDialog: This option may break some services, such as Xbox. Use it at your own risk. It can be reverted by changing it back to 'Recommended'
tweaksPerformanceLastTimeAccessDescripti: Disabling Last Time Access improves the performance of file and directory access, reduces disk I/O load and latency
tweaksPerformance8dot3NamingDescription: 8.3 naming is ancient and disabling it will improve NTFS performance and security
tweaksPerformancePagedPoolLimitDescripti: Boosts the memory allocated for managing files. This can speed up tasks involving many files at once, but may reduce the memory available for your apps and system cache. Primarily useful for systems with high RAM capacity and heavy file-indexing needs
tweaksPerformanceBADescription: Allow apps to run in the background, even when you're not using them. This will have a performance impact due to constantly running in the background. Disabling this will also disable notifications for some apps
tweaksPerformanceBWMRDescription: Controls how often background apps receive mouse and keyboard input updates. A higher rate (125 Hz) offers maximum responsiveness, while a lower rate (50 Hz) improves performance by reducing background processing but may cause issues with hotkeys or idle detection.
tweaksPerformanceFSODescription: Fullscreen Optimizations may lead to better gaming and app performance when running in fullscreen mode
tweaksPerformanceOWGDescription: Improves frame latency by using a new presentation model for DirectX 10 and 11 games that appear in a window or in a borderless window
tweaksPerformanceMPODescription: Enables dedicated GPU hardware scanout planes for lower latency via Hardware Composed: Independent Flip. If you experience screen glitches in some apps, turn this setting off
tweaksPerformanceIntelTSXDescription: Add hardware transactional memory support, which helps speed up the execution of multithreaded software at the cost of security
tweaksPerformanceCStates: Disable the ACPI C2 and C3 states
tweaksPerformanceCStatesDescription: Disabling ACPI C-states may improve performance and latency, but it will consume more power while idle, potentially reducing battery life
tweaksPersonalizationNotificationsDescri: 'Minimal' disables notifications, while 'Full' removes Notification Center, preventing the calendar and notifications panels from appearing
tweaksPersonalizationLegacyNotificationB: Tray programs on the taskbar will render as balloons instead of toast notifications
tweaksPersonalizationInkingAndTypingPers: Windows will learn what you type to improve suggestions when writing
tweaksPersonalizationScreenEdgeSwipeDesc: Disabling this fixes the taskbar pop-up when in fullscreen mode
tweaksUtilitiesHibernateDescription: A power-saving S4 state, saves the current session to hiberfile and turns off the device. Disabled by default to avoid instability during dual-booting or system upgrades
tweaksUtilitiesHibernateModeDescription:
Full - Supports hibernate and fast startup. The hiberfile will be 40% of physical RAM installed. Hibernate is available to be added to the power menu.

Reduced - Only supports Fast Startup without hibernate, The hiberfile will be 20% of physical RAM installed and removes hibernate from the power menu
tweaksUtilitiesFastStartupDescription: Save the current session to C:\hiberfil.sys for faster startup, does not affect reboots. Disabled by default to avoid instability during dual-booting or system upgrades
tweaksUtilitiesTMMonitoringDescription: Activate the monitoring services for Task Manager
tweaksUtilitiesUsageReportingDescription: Reports Battery health and Data usage; Activation may slow down your system
tweaksUtilitiesUpdateKGLDescription: Force an update of the Known Game List (KGL) for Xbox Game Bar to fix issues with core parking on dual CCD processors
tweaksUpdatesWUPauseDescription: When enabled, Windows Updates are paused 'till 2038/01/19
tweaksUpdatesWUPageDescription: Showing this page will also enable update notifications
tweaksUpdatesWUDriversDescription: To install drivers in ReviOS, you need to manually check for updates in Settings, as automatic Windows Updates are not supported
